Name.label: Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with portal hypertension
Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with another disease

TextSection.Contents: Pulmonary arterial hypertension associated with portal hypertension (PAH-PH) is a form of pulmonary arterial hypertension (PAH), characterized by an elevated pulmonary arterial resistance leading to right heart failure observed as a complication of portal hypertension.
